name: Time Virus
description: You as the member of project 'Time Virus' need to control the robot following the rhythm of music to finish your mission and get to know what happened in the game. This is an open-music game, you can import .mp3 file to play, you will have different experience when using music with different rhythm.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Memory: 2000 MB RAM Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Memory: 2000 MB RAM Storage: 1000 MB available space
